title: Group portrait of the American Woodmen Giants Little League baseball players and coaches, from left, seated: William Grimes, Norman Hunt, Ronald King, Michael Ogden, Melvin Harris, Julius Graham, and James Wortham; second row, Theodore Fletcher, Jerome Parks, Stanley Page, Carmel Stewart, Lawrence Newring, Donald Marbury, and Steven Boyd; back row: Mary Martin, Mildred Allen, Lee A. Matthews, Robert Lee Mahaffey, and Mrs. Beatrice Mahaffey, posed on bench on baseball field, possibly Kennard Field
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
